name: Gender Dysphoria Experience
description:
The main goal of this game is to create awareness to transgender topics, by trying to make the player feel the same discomfort that a transgender person can feel in a day-to-day bases, and how society can intensify those feelings.

The game starts on mind and body dysphoria, since those are the types of dysphoria that people can feel, even when they are alone and then ends with an example of different scenarios that a transgender person can experience in one day.

Controls

A & D to move left and right.

Space to jump.

Individual project. Work schedule decided by Ruffle the cat.

Music by ShadyDav

Clock sound effect by Tetrisrocker
